snippet: On Thursday, a U.S. court jailed one of the world's most notorious arms dealers. But is the world any safer, with so many "legal" weapons still out there? Governments are negotiating an international treaty that would oversee the trade. But not...
abstract: On Thursday, a U.S. court jailed one of the world's most notorious arms dealers. But is the world any safer, with so many "legal" weapons still out there? Governments are negotiating an international treaty that would oversee the trade. But not everyone is happy.

headline.main: The Legal vs. the Illegal Arms Trade
